title: AO live blog: Fritz, Medvedev, Rybakina kickstart campaigns on Day 3
description: A host of stars are set to grace the courts at Melbourne Park for the third and final day of Round 1 action.
author: ESPN staff
excerpt: A host of stars are set to grace the courts at Melbourne Park for the third and final day of Round 1 action.
text: Naomi Osaka advances to 2nd round in win over Caroline Garcia (0:41)Naomi Osaka moves on to the second round after winning in three sets against Caroline Garcia in the Australian Open. (0:41)ESPN staffJan 13, 2025, 06:20 PM ETA host of stars are set to grace the courts at Melbourne Park for the third and final day of Round 1 action.Among the standout clashes, No. 4 seed Taylor Fritz will go head-to-head with compatriot Jenson Brooksby in an all-American clash, while Elena Rybakina and Daniil Medvedev will both look to kickstart their campaigns with a win.Stay tuned as we bring you all the live action, updates, and highlights from today's epic slate of matches.
html:
• ESPN staffJan 13, 2025, 06:20 PM ET

A host of stars are set to grace the courts at Melbourne Park for the third and final day of Round 1 action.

Among the standout clashes, No. 4 seed Taylor Fritz will go head-to-head with compatriot Jenson Brooksby in an all-American clash, while Elena Rybakina and Daniil Medvedev will both look to kickstart their campaigns with a win.

Stay tuned as we bring you all the live action, updates, and highlights from today's epic slate of matches.
